subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Capitals moved Alex Ovechkin to right wing at the start of the season because he had become predictable on the left. Despite only five goals this season, he is slowly adjusting to the switch.
snippet: The Capitals moved Alex Ovechkin to right wing at the start of the season because he had become predictable on the left. Despite only five goals this season, he is slowly adjusting to the switch.
